summary: Completed testing of Today Attendance Black Card fix - Backend API correctly includes 'Shift Incomplete' status in present count, but Frontend login integration is broken preventing UI testing

critical_bugs.issue: Login form submission not triggering API calls to backend
critical_bugs.impact: Users cannot log in to access dashboard with attendance counts
critical_bugs.details: Form fills correctly but clicking LOGIN button does not send request to /api/auth/login endpoint

integration_issues.issue: No network requests generated when login form is submitted

passed_tests: Backend correctly includes 'Shift Incomplete' in attendance counting logic

success_percentage.frontend: 0% - Cannot access due to login failure

action_item_for_main_agent: CRITICAL: Fix frontend login form integration - form submission is not sending requests to backend API. Backend authentication works correctly via direct API calls, but frontend form is not connecting to the backend.
